title: Charming garden-style 3 BR / 2 BA in College Park! Now renting!
posting_body: ['The Enclave at Riverdale', 'Bedroom: 3 | Bathroom: 2', 'Square Footage: 1300 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent: $1723', 'show contact info', 'Community Description', 'The Enclave is located in College Park and offers one, two and three bedroom apartments with interior features that include large, open floor-plans, kitchens with granite-like countertops, updated appliances, and European cabinetry, wine racks in select units, fireplaces, washer/dryer connections, spacious closets and faux hardwood floors.', 'Community Amenities', '✓ Cardio & Fitness Center', '✓ Community Events', '✓ On-site Maintenance', '✓ On-Site Management', '✓ Pet Care', '✓ Resort Style Swimming Pool', '✓ Basketball Court', '✓ Business Center Coming Soon!', '✓ Clothes Care Center', '✓ Community Lake', '✓ Electronic Rent Payment', '✓ Package Receiving', '✓ Tennis Court', 'Unit Features', '✓ Air Conditioning/Heating', '✓ Cable Ready', '✓ Carpet', '✓ Ceiling Fans', '✓ Dining Room', '✓ Dishwasher', '✓ Disposal', '✓ Kitchen', '✓ Range', '✓ Tub/Shower', '✓ Fireplace in Select Units', '✓ Full unit upgrade', '✓ High Speed Internet Access', '✓ Microwave', '✓ Plank Flooring', '✓ Vinyl Flooring', '✓ Walk-In Closets', '✓ Washer/Dryer Hookup', '✓ Window Coverings', 'Contact Information', 'Visit Us:', '1507 Pine Dr', 'College Park, GA 30349', 'show contact info', 'Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Additional Details', 'Pet Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', '$15 pet monthly fee.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50 lbs.', 'Please call our Leasing Office for complete Pet Policy information.', 'Lease Terms:', '6-Month,10-Month,11-Month,12-Mont', 'Management Company:', 'Ventron Management', 'Price is subject to change without prior notice', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '18F425B94AF5493']
